buildGrows.title: We build Grows for ourselves. This means a lot:

list.subTitle: Low fees
list.text: No one loves fees. We make sure to bring the costs as low as possible and eliminate any hidden things.

list.subTitle: Security
list.text: Grows is regulated by the Financial Supervision Authority (FSA) of Estonia, under European Union laws.

list.subTitle: Privacy
list.text: Your information is secure, confidential and only used for creating an account compliant with EU laws.

buildCard.text3: ‚ÄúThe idea of Grows came about when I took my wife to the hospital to give birth to our first kid.
buildCard.text4: On the way home, a sense of impending responsibility overwhelmed me: ‚Äúa new person is about to appear - why should she be at the risk that I am taking?‚Äù...

footer.title: Contact us
footer.descr: This website is operated by Grows Technologies OU, being registered by FSA (Financial Supervision Authority of Estonia) as a Small Alternative Fund Manager. Asset management services are provided to clients of Grows by Grows Technologies OU. Grows does not provide investment advice on investments that are guaranteed by a bank or otherwise, or that are insured. Investing involves risk and investments may lose value. Please consider your investment risk tolerance, objectives and Grows pricing before investing. Past performance does not guarantee or indicate future results. Investment outcomes and projections are hypothetical in nature. Grows does not provide tax advice and investment advice. Please consult a tax professional for consultations about taxes. To understand Calculation Methodology, refer to the Disclosure.
